text: Abdelbaki Hermassi (; 26 December 1937 – 23 October 2021) was a Tunisian politician. He was the Minister of Foreign Affairs of Tunisia from November 10, 2004 until August 17, 2005. He was the minister of culture of Tunisia. He was an ally of President Zine El Abidine Ben Ali. He was born in Fériana, Tunisia. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Tunisian politicians
title: Abdelbaki Hermassi
